mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no reviewNo, r.review_title reviewTitle, r.review_content reviewContent, r.createdate, m.customer_id customerId FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation p ON r.program_reservation_no = p.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment m ON p.payment_no = m.payment_no INNER JOIN customer c ON m.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
